subject: ORDER #SSN1569
description_text:
Hello,

Just received my pedals and baseplate but no rumble motors?

When will I receive my reactor/rumble kit? 

Met vriendelijke groet,

Michael van Eerdt

conversations.body_text: Hi Michael van Eerdt,  Due to delays in the surface finishing of the VAM Pro housing, the first batch of orders is expected to begin shipping between June 16th and 18th. International express shipping will be used, ensuring fast delivery.
